snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton said “the defining economic challenge of our time” is raising incomes for the vast majority of Americans whose wages have remained virtually stagnant for 15 years.
abstract: Democratic presidential hopeful Hillary Clinton lays out details of her economic plan during speech in Greenwich Village, focusing on raising workers' wages, providing better access to early childhood education and rising health care costs.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton said “the defining economic challenge of our time” is raising incomes for the vast majority of Americans whose wages have remained virtually stagnant for 15 years.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Offers Her Vision of a ‘Fairness Economy’ to Close the Income Gap
headline.print_headline: Clinton Offers Her Vision of a ‘Fairness Economy’ to Close the Income Gap
